name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Place Card Template & Table Name Card

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Free and Easy Printable place cards template, Free Place Card Maker-Design Place Cards Online

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
placecard ( https://placecard.us ) is a smart tool that allows you to quickly and easily create custom place cards for any occasion. With just one click, you can export your place cards to PDF and print them out in a variety of sizes and styles.

Some key features of Placecard include:

Customization options: Choose from a range of fonts, colors, and layout options to create the perfect place cards for your event.
- PDF style preview: See exactly how your place cards will look before you print them out.
- Display data: Display important information such as names, table numbers, and more on your place cards.
- Size options: Print your place cards in a variety of sizes, including A4 and A5.

Data privacy is also a top priority with Placecard. All data is processed locally on your computer and is never passed through our web server, so no one else will know what you have exported.

privacy-policy: https://placecard.us/privacy-policy
